subject: Address: 405 E 42nd St, New
body:
Address: 405 E 42nd St, New York, NY 10017, USA
E-mail: 
un001@secretary.net
CONGRATULATION
This is to officially inform you that your name was among the 18 listed beneficiaries to benefit from this first batch of overdue Scam victims' compensation payment for the year 2023.
The payment was approved after the meeting held on October 10 with (G20) and (UN) on World Economic Forum Annual Meeting 2023 and it was signed that 18 listed beneficiaries will receive $1,000,000.00 each as their overdue scam victim compensation payment and your name and contact email was included as one of the beneficiaries, So contact Mr. Michael Tanzi Of Quontic Bank Of New York to receive your approved compensation payment.
Person to contact: Mr. Michael Tanzi Chief Accounting Officer
E-mail:   
qountic.info@protonmail.com
E-mail:   
info6@qualityservice.com
E-mail:   
quontic.info@privyinternet.com
Note instructions have been given to Quontic Bank Of New York to release your Scam victim's compensation Fund US$1,000,000.00 to you VIA direct transfer or by Certified Cashiers Cheque.
Thanks,
Yours In Service
Mr. Ant√≥nio Guterres
UN Secretary-General

subject: Re:   Address: 405 E 42nd St, New
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information. It's quite surprising to hear that my name was included in such a list. Could you please provide more details about how my name ended up on this list? Also, I'm curious about the process of receiving this payment. How does it work exactly?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Melissa
